The user should be able to create a new contact. A contact should contain the following information: First Name, Last Name, Email, Phone, Address, Company Name, Job Title, Notes
The user should be able to edit an existing contact
The user should be able to delete an existing contact
The user should be able to search for a contact by First Name, Last Name, Email, Phone, Address, Company Name, Job Title, Notes
The user should be able to view a list of all contacts
